t: Curbside Splendor Under Fire by Authors, Goes On Publishing Hiatus
s: April 10, 2019 - Curbside Splendor has gone on a publishing hiatus this year as the 10-year-old literary press responds to author complaints of not receiving royalties by terminating contracts and reverting rights to books to their authors. Publisher Victor Giron hopes to resume publishing books in 2020.
